magic paths [mpath]: A1 E1 U1 R11
item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
Mage engineers are mage-philosophers specializing in the physics and mechanics of the Arcana. They combine their philosophical learning with magic to try to define the laws governing the universe and use their findings to invent practical things. Mage engineers are very skilled at siegecraft and castle defense.
